TypeTeamMember.biography: Shaun is Co-founder and President of TripleLift. As President, Shaun has been a chief architect of the company's growth from startup to one of America's fastest-growing companies. He leads the company's efforts in establishing new business lines, driving strategic customer success, and aligning its Product, Solutions, and Engineering organizations. Prior to co-founding TripleLift, Shaun pioneered real-time bidding and programmatic advertising solutions at AppNexus on behalf of its most strategic brand-direct, agency trade desk, and publisher customers. Shaun has been named to Forbes' 30 under 30 for his contributions in advertising and technology.
